programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Seminoles visit the Mustangs. Florida State snapped a surprising three-game skid to begin 2024 by outlasting California 14-9 in Week 4. Brashard Smith scored four times to help SMU capture a wild Iron Skillet matchup with TCU, 66-42 on Sept. 21.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Orange host the No. 23 Yellow Jackets. Kyle McCord threw for four TDs in his Syracuse debut, a 38-22 win over Ohio. Georgia Tech went to Dublin to beat Florida State on a late field goal, and won 35-12 in its home opener versus Georgia State.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Tar Heels (4-4, 1-3 ACC) visit the Seminoles (1-7, 1-6). North Carolina snapped a four-game slide by smashing Virginia 41-14 on Oct. 26. Florida State is having its worst season since 1974, two years before legendary coach Bobby Bowden took over.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Golden Bears (5-5, 1-5 ACC) and Cardinal (3-7, 2-5) put a new spin on an old rivalry. California claimed four of the last five meetings with Stanford during their Pac-12 days. Cal clinches bowl eligibility for a second straight year with a win.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The No. 8 Hurricanes (5-0, 1-0 ACC) travel to play the Golden Bears (3-1, 0-1). Heisman Trophy candidate Cam Ward tossed four TD passes, including the last two scores of the game, to lead Miami to a 38-34 comeback win over Virginia Tech on Sept. 28.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Cardinal begin their ACC era by squaring off against the Orange for the first time. Syracuse quarterback Kyle McCord threw for at least 350 yards and four TDs in both wins this year, including a Sept. 7 decision against then-No. 23 Georgia Tech.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Hokies hone in on the Blue Devils. Senior defensive lineman Antwaun Powell-Ryland (VT) ranked second nationally with 13 sacks entering Week 13. Jontavis Robertson scored his only career touchdown when Duke dumped Virginia Tech 24-7 in 2022.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The No. 15 Panthers (10-2) and No. 16 Demon Deacons (10-2) collide in the ACC championship game. Pittsburgh seeks its first conference title. Wake Forest wore the crown in 2006. The Deacons' Sam Hartman is ninth nationally with 34 TD passes in 2021.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The No. 8 Hurricanes (5-0, 1-0 ACC) travel to play the Golden Bears (3-1, 0-1). Heisman Trophy candidate Cam Ward tossed four TD passes, including the last two scores of the game, to lead Miami to a 38-34 comeback win over Virginia Tech on Sept. 28.
